OneHandedWeapon.name: AxeBlackMetal
OneHandedWeapon.description: A perfectly-balanced axe forged from dark metal with an emerald sheen.

OneHandedWeapon.name: AxeBronze
OneHandedWeapon.description: A bright and burnished blade, curved like a smile.

OneHandedWeapon.name: AxeIron
OneHandedWeapon.description: Sharp and strong, a woodcutter's friend.

OneHandedWeapon.name: AxeJotunBane
OneHandedWeapon.description: Not even the giants of old could weather the poisonous bite of this weapon.

OneHandedWeapon.name: AxeWood
OneHandedWeapon.description: If this axe could chop wood, wouldn't that be strange?

OneHandedWeapon.name: SwordBlackmetal
OneHandedWeapon.description: A sharp sword made from black metal.

TwoHandedWeapon.name: AtgeirBlackmetal
TwoHandedWeapon.description: A vicious hewing-axe of almost unbreakable black metal.

TwoHandedWeapon.name: AtgeirHimminAfl
TwoHandedWeapon.description: It might not be a hammer, but Thor himself would still approve of this weapon.

TwoHandedWeapon.name: AtgeirWood
TwoHandedWeapon.description: It might not hurt a skeleton, but it looks dangerous.

TwoHandedWeapon.name: BattleaxeBlackmetal
TwoHandedWeapon.description: Green shall be the last thing your foes see before you cleave them in half.

TwoHandedWeapon.name: BattleaxeSkullSplittur
TwoHandedWeapon.description: Will find skulls to split even in the thickest of mists.

TwoHandedWeapon.name: BattleaxeWood
TwoHandedWeapon.description: Intimidating, but not as intimidating as the real thing.

Bow.name: BowAshlands
Bow.description: Risen again from the ashes, this bow holds unyielding strength.

Bow.name: BowDraugrFang
Bow.description: Dark wood strung with glistening sinew. A vicious thing.

Bow.name: BowFineWood
Bow.description: A simple bow of strong and supple wood.

Bow.name: BowHuntsman
Bow.description: Finely worked and strung. A huntsman's joy.

Bow.name: BowSpineSnap
Bow.description: Using this bow is backbreaking work but so worth it.

Bow.name: CrossbowRipper
Bow.description: Rips your foes apart, simple as that.

Обладунки.name: ArrowBronze
Обладунки.description: Sharper than flint. A sleek messenger of death.

Обладунки.name: ArrowCarapace
Обладунки.description: Heavy and pointy, this one's gonna hurt.

Обладунки.name: ArrowCharred
Обладунки.description: This arrow has been whittled into shape from a charred femur, and it's as hard as any metal.

Обладунки.name: ArrowFire
Обладунки.description: This arrow burns whatever it pierces.

Обладунки.name: ArrowFlint
Обладунки.description: A hide-breaker with a head of flint.

Обладунки.name: ArrowIron
Обладунки.description: Capped with iron and flighted with dark feathers.

Обладунки.name: ArrowSilver
Обладунки.description: A needle to calm restless spirits.

Обладунки.name: BoltBlackmetal
Обладунки.description: A sleek bolt of dark metal.

Обладунки.name: BoltBone
Обладунки.description: A crude bolt of yellowed bone.

Обладунки.name: BoltCharred
Обладунки.description: A sturdy bone from a forearm, shaped into a deadly bolt.

Helmet.name: HelmetAshlandsMediumHood
Helmet.description: As the first man of Midgard, Ask knew it was important to not draw too much attention to himself.

Helmet.name: HelmetBerserkerHood
Helmet.description: Let the primal rage of a mighty bear consume you.

Helmet.name: HelmetBronze
Helmet.description: This will help to keep your brains inside your skull.

Helmet.name: HelmetCarapace
Helmet.description: People might say you look like a giant ant. But they will only say it once.

Helmet.name: HelmetDverger
Helmet.description: A portable perpetual lightsource for the dungeon explorer.

Helmet.name: HelmetFenring
Helmet.description: The eyes of the beast were wise and knowing, so that it could measure the strength of a warrior in one glance.

Helmet.name: HelmetIron
Helmet.description: A helm of polished iron, fit for a hero.

Helmet.name: HelmetTrollLeather
Helmet.description: Trollskin is hard to work but makes exceptional armour.

Chest.name: ArmorAshlandsMediumChest
Chest.description: The first man in Midgard knew how to guard his most vital organs, perhaps with a breastplate just like this one.

Chest.name: ArmorBerserkerChest
Chest.description: If these intricate designs can protect warriors from distant lands, they can surely protect you too.

Chest.name: ArmorCarapaceChest
Chest.description: A breastplate crafted from the burnished carapace of a giant insect.

Chest.name: ArmorIronChest
Chest.description: An iron scale mail, this will turn all but the strongest of blows.

Chest.name: ArmorLeatherChest
Chest.description: A tunic made from animal hide.

Chest.name: ArmorPaddedCuirass
Chest.description: Finely wrought and strong enough to turn even the sharpest blades.

Chest.name: ArmorRootChest
Chest.description: Finely wrought and strong enough to turn even the sharpest blades.

Chest.name: ArmorTrollLeatherChest
Chest.description: Trolls are hard to skin but their leather is tough and warm.

Chest.name: ArmorWolfChest
Chest.description: A wolfskin jerkin, warm and wild-looking. It protects against the cold.

Legs.name: ArmorAshlandsMediumlegs
Legs.description: The first man to roam Midgard preferred to tread lightly. Wearers of these trousers could learn a thing or two from him.

Legs.name: ArmorBerserkerLegs
Legs.description: It covers all the important bits, but not much else.

Legs.name: ArmorBronzeLegs
Legs.description: Bronze greaves to shield your legs.

Legs.name: ArmorCarapaceLegs
Legs.description: Leg guards of a rigid carapace.

Legs.name: ArmorIronLegs
Legs.description: Iron greaves to protect your legs.

Legs.name: ArmorLeatherLegs
Legs.description: They squeak a little when you walk.

Legs.name: ArmorRootLegs
Legs.description: A light armour oddly woven together by ancient roots and bark.

Shoulder.name: CapeAsh
Shoulder.description: Thin metal threads are woven into this cape to create an intricate pattern, like a destiny woven by the Norns themselves.

Shoulder.name: CapeFeather
Shoulder.description: Donning this cape makes you feel lighter, almost as if you could fly!

Shoulder.name: CapeLox
Shoulder.description: A pelt from one of the great beasts, thick and warm.

Shoulder.name: CapeOdin
Shoulder.description: Odin's finest warriors deserve the finest cloth.

Shoulder.name: CapeWolf
Shoulder.description: Wolves are natural survivors. This one was just unlucky. Now its pelt will warm you in the snow.

Tool.name: Cultivator
Tool.description: A farming tool for tilling soil.

Tool.name: Hammer
Tool.description: With this to your hand, you can raise high halls and mighty fortifications.

Tool.name: PickaxeAntler
Tool.description: A pickaxe made from a hard antler.

Utility.name: Demister
Utility.description: A bound wisp to guide you through the thickest of mists.

Consumable.name: BlackSoup
Consumable.description: A perfect balance of sweetness and acidity.

Consumable.name: CarrotSoup
Consumable.description: A warm tasty soup made of mostly carrots.

Consumable.name: CookedLoxMeat
Consumable.description: A great hunk of tender meat, food fit for Valhalla!

Consumable.name: FishAndBread
Consumable.description: Bounty from both land and sea.

Consumable.name: FishCooked
Consumable.description: A tasty side of smoked fish.

Consumable.name: FishWraps
Consumable.description: Bread and fish, what more to wish?

Consumable.name: MeadHealthMajor
Consumable.description: Restores a large amount of health over time.

Consumable.name: SerpentStew
Consumable.description: A stew made from serpent meat.

Material.name: Acorn
Material.description: Plant them to grow an oak tree.

Material.name: AskHide
Material.description: This sturdy leather is thick, and still warm to the touch.

Material.name: BeechSeeds
Material.description: Plant them to grow a beech tree.

Material.name: BirchSeeds
Material.description: Plant them to grow a birch tree.

Material.name: BlackMetal
Material.description: A heavy bar of dark metal.

Material.name: BlackMetalScrap
Material.description: A twisted hunk of dark metal.

Material.name: Bloodbag
Material.description: The contents of a leech. Ick!

Material.name: Bronze
Material.description: A strong alloy of copper and tin.

Material.name: BronzeNails
Material.description: Used in construction of ships and furniture.

Material.name: CarrotSeeds
Material.description: Plant these if you like carrots...

Material.name: Copper
Material.description: A bar of pure copper ready to be worked.

Material.name: CopperOre
Material.description: Unrefined copper. Needs to be refined in a smelter.

Material.name: Crystal
Material.description: A shard of crystal from deep within the earth.

Material.name: DeerHide
Material.description: A cleaned hide from a deer.

Material.name: DragonTear
Material.description: The last frozen tear of a dragon, pulsating with mysterious energy.

Material.name: Entrails
Material.description: A slimy length of something's insides.

Material.name: FineWood
Material.description: High quality wood for fine carpentry.

Material.name: FirCone
Material.description: Plant it to grow a fir tree.

Material.name: Flax
Material.description: Unspun fibers from a flax plant.

Material.name: Flint
Material.description: Can be shaped into sharp blades.

Material.name: FreezeGland
Material.description: This mysterious organ keeps a perfect temperature.

Material.name: GreydwarfEye
Material.description: The milky eyeball of a Greydwarf.

Material.name: HardAntler
Material.description: A piece of very hard antlers.

Material.name: RoundLog
Material.description: Fine wood from a core tree.

Material.name: SurtlingCore
Material.description: It hums with a mysterious energy.

Material.name: YmirRemains
Material.description: The earthly remains of the giant Ymir.

Trophy.name: TrophyBonemass
Trophy.description: It drips with a foul substance.

Trophy.name: TrophyDraugr
Trophy.description: The desiccated head of a Draugr.

Trophy.name: TrophyEikthyr
Trophy.description: The head of Eikthyr, still buzzing with power.

Trophy.name: TrophySkeleton
Trophy.description: The grinning skull of a skeleton.

Trophy.name: TrophySurtling
Trophy.description: Composed of glowing embers, it still feels warm.

Trophy.name: TrophyWolf
Trophy.description: A wolf's head, frozen in a snarl.

Misc.name: AncientSeed
Misc.description: Held against your ear, you hear tiny whisperings within...

Misc.name: AsksvinEgg
Misc.description: Hard as rock, yet you can sense the presence of something inside. This should be kept warm.

Misc.name: BarberKit
Misc.description: A kit fit for the finest of barbers.

Misc.name: Bell
Misc.description: For whom does the bell toll?

Misc.name: CryptKey
Misc.description: Partly covered in caked mud, it smells foetid.

Misc.name: DragonEgg
Misc.description: Far heavier than it looks, with a faint humming sound from within.

Misc.name: GoblinTotem
Misc.description: Channels the ancient power of Yagluth.

Misc.name: Vegvisir
Misc.description: Shows the location of a boss.
